paragraphs: The address of the church is Bernard Street, Sheffield, S2 5PU.

image.alt: St John's Park church building and grounds

parking.heading: Parking
paragraphs: We have a steep driveway to a car park just off Bernard Street with limited parking.

Overflow parking is available in the car park behind the flats at the top of the church grounds. From Bernard Street, turn onto Cricket Inn Road, then the first major right onto Maltravers Road, then right again onto St John's Street. Follow the road to the end of the car park and use the public footpath through the old churchyard to reach church.

public_transport.heading: Public Transport
paragraphs: We have good public transport links. Hyde Park tram stop is right next to the church.

send_message.heading: Send Us a Message
send_message.intro_prefix: You can email us directly at
